survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the usability and features of our banking mobile app to enhance user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our banking mobile app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to measure frequency of usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use our banking mobile app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in our banking mobile app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify popular features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with 'Other' as an open-text option

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in our banking mobile app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall ease of navigation in our banking mobile app?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this single-choice question.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall ease of navigation in our banking mobile app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the mobile app experience?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the mobile app experience?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues (e.g., crashes, slow loading) while using the app in the past 3 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to identify technical issues.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues (e.g., crashes, slow loading) while using the app in the past 3 months?
